summary: ON JUNE 23RD I JUST RETURNED FROM GETTING MARRIED IN RENO NEVADA I PARKED MY CAR IN THE DRIVE WAY CAME BACK TO PUT THE CAR IN THE GARAGE MY STEERING WHEEL COLUMN WAS LOCKED I HAD TO HAVE IT TOWED TO THE DEALER I SEE THIS HAS HAPPENED TO SEVERAL OTHER OWNERS IF THIS WAS TO HAPPEN WHILE DRIVING IT COULD CAUSE LOSS OF LIFE OF MINE AS WELL AS OTHERS  GM  SHOULD RECALL THIS SAFETY DEFECT BEFORE SOMEONE LOOSES THEIR LIFE.   *NLM  REF. IN EA02-031 *CJS
